title: Provided further that such step backs as stated above may also be allowed on one or more sides, however on other sides than the step back, shall have to maintain the regular open spaces as per these regulations
clause_text: Provided further that such step backs as stated above may also be allowed on one or more sides, however on other sides than the step back, shall have to maintain the regular open spaces as per these regulations.
section: Side and rear open space in relation to the height of the building for light and ventilation-
